text.p: Dentsply International Inc said Thursday that Gary Kunkle had been named president and chief operating officer effective January 1.
The company said John Miles, its president and chief executive, was elected vice chairman of the board and will continue to serve as chief executive.
Before joining Dentsply Kunkle spent more than 20 years with Johnson & Johnson and 1994 he served as president of that company's division in Florida, Dentsply said.
